…CORREA. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to congratulate the students of  Magnolia Science Academy in my district, who have achieved a tremendous  milestone, qualifying for the VEX Robotics World Championship.

These students have shown that dedication and hard work does pay off.  They have earned the opportunity to compete on the international stage.

I also paid tribute to the school's robotics club that has partnered  with NASA. They were the only high school in the United States of  America selected alongside other higher education institutions like  MIT.

Mrs. FISCHBACH. Mr. Speaker, I rise to congratulate Mechatronics Team  3133, the Alexandria Area High School's robotics team, on winning the  Impact Award.

Rebecca is a teacher at Mifflin County High School. Through her  teaching, students explore engineering design, digital fabrication,  robotics, and manufacturing challenges that mirror real-world industry.  Rebecca's colleagues praise her for her leadership and creativity.
